royal_backing.description: An employee of the royal family. Unconditional access to part time jobs and academy classes. Monthly salary of 1000g.
royal_backing.name: Roya Backing

ink_mage.description:
A magician with an affinity for ink. A rare non-combat variant of the magician class. 
As a non-combat class, stat gains from leveling up are low, combat skills are difficult to acquire, and experience can be obtained for non-combat actions.
ink_mage.name: Ink Mage

gray.description:
An autonomous combat golem created by Hiyori.
Has a surprisingly high power level, but Mao would never let her fight.
A small amount of mana is used daily for recharging.
gray.name: Gray

class_change_card.description:
A blue I.D. card allowing access to the class change hall for tier 1 classes.
By design, it doesn't update your information after being printed, so you would need to print a new one to update your information.
For various reasons, it's best to change on your birthday, so have this ready at the end of the year.
class_change_card.name: Class Change Card

class_change_card_witch.description:
A slightly ominous black I.D. card which allows access to the tier 0 class change hall.
Similar to other class change cards, you need to print a new one to update your information.
Because it's a class change within the same tier, certain penalties will be applied after class change.
class_change_card_witch.name: Class Change Card
